name: prueba-monorepo
description: Monorepo para aplicaci√≥n distribuida con React y Node.js

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:medico"
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:apps: npm run build --workspace=apps/frontend && npm run build --workspace=apps/admin-service && npm run build --workspace=apps/medico-service
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:packages && npm run install:apps
scripts.install:apps: npm install --workspace=apps/frontend && npm install --workspace=apps/admin-service && npm install --workspace=apps/medico-service
